title: FancyPlugins documentation
subtitle: Here you'll find documentation about how to use the plugins, including installation, commands and API.

tips.title: FancyNpcs
tips.description: This FancyNpcs is a lightweight and fast plugin that allows you to create custom NPCs to enhance your server.

tips.title: FancyHolograms
tips.description: FancyHologram is a lightweight and fast plugin that allows you to create holograms with display-entities.
